titles.title: Farm-to-Market Road Repair Act of 2020
To amend title 23, United States Code, to expand eligibility for the surface transportation block grant program, and for other purposes.
Farm-to-Market Road Repair Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
Farm-to-Market Road Repair Act of 2020
This bill expands eligibility for the surface transportation block grant program to include projects for the construction of roads in rural areas that primarily serve to transport agricultural products from a farm or ranch to a marketplace.
